name: Digital Tactics Ltd.
description:
Our clients range from startups and SMEs, to global corporations including some of the worlds biggest media and gaming companies. We develop highly complex web based data processing and management tools for large scale construction and engineering projects and also run a number of our own websites and software as a service tools. We are a team of expert software developers and system administrators, working tirelessly to bring the best new technologies to the web.
